title: Sheikh ASSIM AL HAKEEM is coming to Canada ðŸ‡¨ðŸ‡¦ In Sha Allah!!! ðŸ¤©ðŸŽ‰ðŸ¥³ðŸŽŠðŸª©
transcript: Assalamu Alaikum Wa Rahmatullahi Wa Barakatuh. My name is Asim Ibn Luqman Hakim. I am from Saudi Arabia. In Sha Allah in couple of weeks I'll be coming to Canada for my first visit to this beautiful country and I hope I enjoy it and you get to benefit from it. It is an invitation from Nova Enterprise with collaboration with Penny Appeal Canada and In Sha Allah we are hoping to visit let's see Toronto, Ottawa, Edmonton and Calgary and I hope I said this correctly and hopefully we would be able to have a good time and to see you all there. You can find the dates and the locations underneath at the link below so hope to see you there. Wassalamu Alaikum Wa Rahmatullahi Wa Barakatuh.
